about_the_game:
Gold is amazing! Playing this game will give you the experience of feeling like a child and competing in a little athletic competition. You may also learn to understand a little more about how molecules feel.
The rules are simple. The object is to catch the target, a golden ball, from among the balls that are moving like molecules in a small, limited space. As for the competition element, the time to catch the target is measured. The average of five consecutive times is calculated as the average score, and the shortest average score is saved as the best score.
If you are good at FPS, you may find it easy.
It could may be more than one ball with the same color as the target ball.

This is also the first game in the Snack Games series, which is designed to be “simply fun” and played as a snack. The game is recommended to be played in between other high-volume games, and the price is very reasonable. We plan to continue releasing more games in this series, so be sure to add them to your list and stay tuned for more information.

Streaming Guidelines

(2) Posting of derivative works created by you based on videos or still images imported from the Contents must be done within the scope permitted by law.
(3) Content or persons who are involved in criminal, antisocial, or other activities that violate the laws of each country, or that affirm or encourage such activities, are not eligible for distribution. Content or persons engaged in specific political, religious, or other activities will also be excluded.
(4) Content that infringes on intellectual property rights will also be excluded.
(5) Content that damages the image or reputation of the parties involved or the title in question will not be considered for inclusion.
(6) Any content that is offensive to public order and morals will not be considered.
(7) Any other content that is deemed inappropriate by the Company will also be excluded.
(8) Please understand that we are not responsible for any disadvantage or trouble caused by images or videos created based on these contents.
(9) Please note that the contents of this guideline may be changed or updated at any time.

name: Golden Ball

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Playing this game will give you the experience of feeling like a child and competing in a little athletic competition. You may also learn to understand a little more about how molecules feel. If you are looking for a game for a change of pace from other games, try this one.
